snippet.title: 30XX - Ace Developer Spotlight
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1029210/30XX/
--
Jump, shoot, and slash your way through 30XX, the roguelike action platformer you can play with a friend! Explore lush, ever-changing worlds that mix precise platforming with fevered combat. Destroy fearsome Guardians. Master unique Powers. Rediscover the thousand years we've lost.

A short clip highlighting some of Ace's new tricks in 30XX. Rise to new heights with the flaming Zen Ascent, and quickly lash behind your enemies with the Dolomite Link to outmaneuver your foes. Ace's Style regenerates quickly, so don't worry too much about conserving Energy. Ace's Weapons each come with a secondary Unleash Blade move, giving each Weapon a unique playstyle with more personality. On top of that, his Techniques are all bound to the keyboard/controller as button combos, so they're all available at once!
